EventStory.Headline: Edited Transcript of SLMJ.J M&A conference call or presentation 18-Dec-20 2:00pm GMT
EventStory.Body:
Sanlam Ltd Acquire a Non-Controlling Minority Shareholding in ARC Financial Services subsidiary Call
Bellville Dec 18, 2020 (Thomson StreetEvents) -- Edited Transcript of Sanlam Ltd M&A conference call or presentation Friday, December 18, 2020 at 2:00:00pm GMT
TEXT version of Transcript

Event.eventTitle: Sanlam Ltd Acquire a Non-Controlling Minority Shareholding in ARC Financial Services subsidiary Call
